item.description:
Massachusetts Institute of Technology -- Cambridge
150 Albany Street (a yellow brick building)
Room Number 1112 -- first floor classroom

Building has three entrances. Enter at the entrance farthest from Massachusetts Ave.

Park on Albany Street for free after 6 pm or there is an MIT lot across the street where you can park without getting a ticket.

Contact: Doug Fuda
Antiwarleague.com
617 331-1491 (cell)
dougfuda@aol.com

Purpose: This meeting will be our third. People will be reporting on possible plans for action to build momentum for a continuation of the "Revolution." Also people will report on their experience at the July 12 Revolution March in Washington, DC. Please join us with your ideas and suggestions.

Doug Fuda
Antiwarleague.com
14 Fletcher Street
Roslindale, MA 02131
USA
617 331-1491 (cell)
dougfuda@aol.com
item.name: Ron Paul Revolution - action items and plans for the future in the Boston area
